system_prompt: You are a crafting expert. Given smithing recipes, predict the resulting item.
response:
I understand! You'd like me to predict crafting results based on smithing recipes. I can see the pattern from your examples:

- Iron Ingot + Iron Ingot = Iron Plate (combining similar materials to make a flat/sheet form)
- Steel Bar + Wood Plank = Steel Hammer (combining metal and wood to make a tool)

Please provide a smithing recipe and I'll predict the resulting item based on typical crafting logic!
